original_text: People will run away to the caves in the hills. They will try to hide in holes in the ground. They will try to escape from the great power of the Lord, when he comes to judge everyone. They will see that he rules with great authority. People will be very afraid when he comes to punish the people on earth. People will run away to the caves in the hills. They will try to hide in holes in the ground. They will try to escape from the great power of the Lord, when he comes to judge everyone. They will see that he rules with great authority. People will be very afraid when he comes to punish the people on earth.
korean_text: 사람들이 암혈과 토굴로 들어가서 여호와께서 땅을 진동시키려고 일어나실 때에 그의 위엄과 그 광대하심의 영광을 피할 것이라

sentences.original_text: People will run away to the caves in the hills.
They will try to hide in holes in the ground.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅의 구멍에 숨으려고 할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They will try to escape from the great power of the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주님의 위대한 권능에서 벗어나려고 할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: when he comes to judge everyone.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 모든 사람을 심판하러 올 때입니다.

sentences.original_text: They will see that he rules with great authority.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그가 큰 권위로 다스리는 것을 볼 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: when he comes to punish the people on earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 땅에 있는 사람들을 벌하기 위해 올 때입니다.

sentences.korean_translation: 그가 땅에 있는 사람들을 벌하기 위해 올 때입니다.
